question: Can I serve Pennie customers if my business is outside Pennsylvania?
text:
Can I serve Pennie customers if my business is outside Pennsylvania?
          
        
YES, producers (agents and brokers) based outside of Pennsylvania can serve Pennie customers, if they meet all Pennie-certification requirements.
NOTE: Brokers who are not located in Pennsylvania must have an non-resident Health Producer License issued by the Pennsylvania Insurance Department (PID) to be certified on Pennie.
For more information regarding Pennsylvania Producer Licensure please visit the 
PID website
.
